about_the_game: Diving in further to the magical world of An Octave Higher, the Extended Soundtrack collection brings you the unique songs from the game. Dive once again into the world of Overture, a city on the edge of a magical revolution, as this original collection takes you back to the struggles, the victories, the laughs and the tears as you relive the adventures of Elise, Franz and Frederic through music.
detailed_description: Diving in further to the magical world of An Octave Higher, the Extended Soundtrack collection brings you the unique songs from the game. Dive once again into the world of Overture, a city on the edge of a magical revolution, as this original collection takes you back to the struggles, the victories, the laughs and the tears as you relive the adventures of Elise, Franz and Frederic through music.

short_description: Return to the magical struggle between classes as this collection of original music featured in An Octave Higher. Here by popular demand, An Octave Higher - Extended Soundtrack features 11 tracks from the game.
